QueenMod:DignifiedSlap.NAME: Dignified Slap
QueenMod:DignifiedSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength this turn only.

QueenMod:DefendOrder.NAME: Defend Order
QueenMod:DefendOrder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.
QueenMod:DefendOrder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. queenmod:Recruit !M! queenmod:Bumblebees. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:MosquitoPlatoon.NAME: Mosquito Platoon
QueenMod:MosquitoPlatoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. Gain queenmod:Nectar equal to the damage dealt.

QueenMod:GatheringSwarm.NAME: Gathering Swarm
QueenMod:GatheringSwarm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, spend !M! queenmod:Nectar to gain !M! queenmod:Swarm. Recall your queenmod:Swarm

QueenMod:HexGuard.NAME: Hex Guard
QueenMod:HexGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Spend queenmod:Nectar to Empower. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:HoneycombSmash.NAME: Honeycomb Smash
QueenMod:HoneycombSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply 1 Weak. Spend queenmod:Nectar to Empower.

QueenMod:Populate.NAME: Populate
QueenMod:Populate.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! queenmod:Drones to your Draw Pile.

QueenMod:Assimilate.NAME: Assimilate
QueenMod:Assimilate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand. Gain !M! queenmod:Swarm for each. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:KillerQueen.NAME: Killer Queen
QueenMod:KillerQueen.DESCRIPTION: If you have more Attacks than Skills and Powers, deal !D! damage.

QueenMod:HiveNetwork.NAME: Hive Network
QueenMod:HiveNetwork.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

QueenMod:BusyBees.NAME: Busy Bees
QueenMod:BusyBees.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade the queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
QueenMod:BusyBees.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of your hand to your draw pile, then upgrade your hand.

QueenMod:Beekeeping.NAME: Beekeeping
QueenMod:Beekeeping.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee. Recall your queenmod:Swarm
QueenMod:Beekeeping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. queenmod:Recruit an upgraded queenmod:Bumblebee. Recall your queenmod:Swarm

QueenMod:Metamorphosis.NAME: Metamorphosis
QueenMod:Metamorphosis.DESCRIPTION: Replace all queenmod:Drones with queenmod:Hornets, queenmod:Bumblebees, or queenmod:Workerbees.

QueenMod:Nourish.NAME: Nourish
QueenMod:Nourish.DESCRIPTION: Spend queenmod:Nectar to recover Health. Exhaust.

QueenMod:HornetSwarm.NAME: Hornet Swarm
QueenMod:HornetSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Play all queenmod:Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile. Exhaust.
QueenMod:HornetSwarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play all queenmod:Hornets in your Hand and Draw Pile.

QueenMod:WarBuzz.NAME: War Buzz
QueenMod:WarBuzz.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-attacks in your hand. Replace them with queenmod:Hornets.

QueenMod:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
QueenMod:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you've played !M! or more cards this turn, draw a card and gain [E} .

QueenMod:RoyalDefenders.NAME: Royal Defenders
QueenMod:RoyalDefenders.DESCRIPTION: When you would take attack damage, Play and Exhaust a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile. queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.
QueenMod:RoyalDefenders.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you would take attack damage, Play a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile. queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

QueenMod:SharpStingers.NAME: Sharper Stingers
QueenMod:SharpStingers.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Hornets do !M! more damage. queenmod:Recruit 2 Hornets.

QueenMod:EnergyBees.NAME: Energy Gatherers
QueenMod:EnergyBees.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of your turn for every 5 queenmod:Industry. queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Workerbees.

QueenMod:PheremoneSwap.NAME: Pheremone Swap
QueenMod:PheremoneSwap.DESCRIPTION: Swap your queenmod:Hornets and queenmod:Bumblebees. Draw a card.
QueenMod:PheremoneSwap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap your queenmod:Hornets and queenmod:Bumblebees. Draw !M! cards.

QueenMod:Mark.NAME: Mark
QueenMod:Mark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable, !M! queenmod:Pollinate and your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

QueenMod:SwarmTactics.NAME: Swarm Tactics
QueenMod:SwarmTactics.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card this turn, gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:StrategicGenius.NAME: Strategic Genius
QueenMod:StrategicGenius.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

QueenMod:OverwhelmingForce.NAME: Overwhelming Force
QueenMod:OverwhelmingForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies (Equal to the number of cards in your deck).

QueenMod:Flyby.NAME: Flyby
QueenMod:Flyby.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

QueenMod:PerfectLanding.NAME: Perfect Landing
QueenMod:PerfectLanding.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Finisher. If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain !B! block. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:CalculatedAttack.NAME: Calculated Attack
QueenMod:CalculatedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Recall half your queenmod:Swarm for the turn.

QueenMod:Feast.NAME: Feast
QueenMod:Feast.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Swarm. If this kills an enemy, gain !M! Swarm.
QueenMod:Feast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Swarm + 4. If this kills an enemy, gain !M! Swarm.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:OrganizedWorkforce.NAME: Organized Workers
QueenMod:OrganizedWorkforce.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your draw pile.

QueenMod:CrossGuard.NAME: Cross-guard
QueenMod:CrossGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Attack in your hand. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:TakeFlight.NAME: Take Flight
QueenMod:TakeFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain queenmod:Flight. Lose 3 queenmod:Nectar at the end of your turn or lose queenmod:Flight.

QueenMod:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
QueenMod:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hive card based on enemy intent.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.
Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. Add a queenmod:Hornet to your hand.
Add a queenmod:Drone from your draw pile to your hand. Add a queenmod:Workerbee to your hand.
Gain !B! block. Add a Drone to your hand.

QueenMod:MilitaryHandbook.NAME: Military Handbook
QueenMod:MilitaryHandbook.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Spend queenmod:Nectar to improve. Exhaust.

QueenMod:PollenBlast.NAME: Pollen Blast
QueenMod:PollenBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and inflict !M! queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.

QueenMod:BlindingSwarm.NAME: Blinding Swarm
QueenMod:BlindingSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Distribute your queenmod:Swarm among all enemies for the turn and inflict 1 Weak to all enemies for every !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:SecretWeapon.NAME: Secret Weapon
QueenMod:SecretWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Spend all queenmod:Nectar. Deal double that amount to an enemy ( !D! damage.)
QueenMod:SecretWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all Nectar. Deal triple that amount to an enemy ( !D! damage.)

QueenMod:GeneralForm.NAME: General Form
QueenMod:GeneralForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. Spend 5 queenmod:Nectar at the end of each turn or lose 2 Strength and Dexterity.

QueenMod:InspiringStrike.NAME: Inspiring Strike
QueenMod:InspiringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade a random card in your draw pile.
QueenMod:InspiringStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade !M! random cards in your draw pile.

QueenMod:HornetCommander.NAME: Hornet Commander
QueenMod:HornetCommander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you play a queenmod:Hive card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

QueenMod:BumbleBeeCommander.NAME: Bumblebee Commander
QueenMod:BumbleBeeCommander.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When you play a queenmod:Hive card this turn, gain !M! Block next turn. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:DroneCommander.NAME: Drone Commander
QueenMod:DroneCommander.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile. Draw a card.
QueenMod:DroneCommander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all queenmod:Drones in your draw pile. Draw 2 cards.

QueenMod:Promotion.NAME: Promotion
QueenMod:Promotion.DESCRIPTION: Promote a queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to a queenmod:Commander. Exhaust.
QueenMod:Promotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Promote a queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to a queenmod:Commander+. Exhaust.

QueenMod:Knighting.NAME: Knighting
QueenMod:Knighting.DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently.
QueenMod:Knighting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently. Gain 5 Block.

QueenMod:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
QueenMod:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: If the last card you played was a skill, deal !D! damage !M! times.

QueenMod:Parry.NAME: Parry
QueenMod:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Apply 1 Vulnerable. Add a queenmod:Riposte to your hand.
QueenMod:Parry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Apply 1 Vulnerable. Add a queenmod:Riposte+ to your hand.

QueenMod:FinishingBlow.NAME: Finishing Blow
QueenMod:FinishingBlow.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Finisher. If you've played 6 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage.

QueenMod:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
QueenMod:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: X random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.
QueenMod:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: X+1 random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

QueenMod:RelentlessAssault.NAME: Relentless Assault
QueenMod:RelentlessAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Attacks once more this combat.

QueenMod:Conscripts.NAME: Conscripts
QueenMod:Conscripts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

QueenMod:Recruit.NAME: Recruit
QueenMod:Recruit.DESCRIPTION: queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet. NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Bumblebee

QueenMod:KillerBee.NAME: Killer Bee
QueenMod:KillerBee.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While this is in your draw pile, its damage is doubled each turn until played.

QueenMod:FlankingStrike.NAME: Flanking Strike
QueenMod:FlankingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. Exhaust.
QueenMod:FlankingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. Exhaust.

QueenMod:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
QueenMod:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a non queenmod:Drone queenmod:Hive card from your draw pile.

QueenMod:Regroup.NAME: Regroup
QueenMod:Regroup.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:WarTrumpet.NAME: War Trumpet
QueenMod:WarTrumpet.DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Drone to your deck for each Attack played this turn.
QueenMod:WarTrumpet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a queenmod:Drone+ to your deck for each Attack played this turn.

QueenMod:SpaDay.NAME: Spa Day
QueenMod:SpaDay.DESCRIPTION: Remove all queenmod:CommonDebuffs and gain double the amount removed as queenmod:Nectar ( !queenmod:M2! ). NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Workerbee.
QueenMod:SpaDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all queenmod:CommonDebuffs and gain double the amount removed as queenmod:Nectar ( !queenmod:M2! ). NL queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Workerbee.

QueenMod:RoyalGuards.NAME: Royal Guards
QueenMod:RoyalGuards.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile. queenmod:Recruit 3 queenmod:Bumblebees. Exhaust.
QueenMod:RoyalGuards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Add 3 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile. queenmod:Recruit 3 queenmod:Bumblebees. Exhaust.

QueenMod:HoneyFactory.NAME: Honey Factory
QueenMod:HoneyFactory.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When drawn, discard to gain !M! queenmod:Nectar and draw a card.

QueenMod:SwarmEconomics.NAME: Swarm Economics
QueenMod:SwarmEconomics.DESCRIPTION: Recall your queenmod:Swarm for the turn. Gain [E] for every !M! queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:HoneyShield.NAME: Honey Shield
QueenMod:HoneyShield.DESCRIPTION: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain !M! block.

QueenMod:Reposition.NAME: Reposition
QueenMod:Reposition.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. queenmod:Recruit a queenmod:Hornet. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:FullRetreat.NAME: Full Retreat
QueenMod:FullRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle your hand into your draw pile. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
QueenMod:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:HoldPosition.NAME: Hold Position
QueenMod:HoldPosition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Add 2 queenmod:Drones to your draw pile. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:Rally.NAME: Rally
QueenMod:Rally.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add queenmod:Drones to your draw pile equal to your Strength.

QueenMod:Multiply.NAME: Multiply
QueenMod:Multiply.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile to your draw pile.

QueenMod:Fleche.NAME: Fleche
QueenMod:Fleche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

QueenMod:AggressionPolicy.NAME: Aggression Policy
QueenMod:AggressionPolicy.DESCRIPTION: If you have more Attacks than skills and powers, Attacks are played once more.

QueenMod:MatingDance.NAME: Mating Dance
QueenMod:MatingDance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. While in your hand, complete a queenmod:Dance to gain !M! queenmod:Swarm, Add !QueenMod:M2! queenmod:Drones to your draw pile and upgrade !QueenMod:M2! cards in your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Swarm. Add !QueenMod:M2! Drones to your deck. Upgrade !QueenMod:M2! cards in your draw pile.

QueenMod:OverwhelmingPower.NAME: Overwhelming Power
QueenMod:OverwhelmingPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] for every 10 cards in your deck.

QueenMod:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
QueenMod:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Damages increases by 1 for each card played this turn and lasts for this combat when played.
QueenMod:Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Damages increases by 1 for each card played this turn and lasts for this combat when played.

QueenMod:SupplyLines.NAME: Supply Lines
QueenMod:SupplyLines.DESCRIPTION: Spend queenmod:Nectar to gain queenmod:Swarm. Recall your queenmod:Swarm.

QueenMod:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
QueenMod:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain queenmod:Swarm equal to your Strength plus !M!. Apply your queenmod:Swarm to an enemy for the turn.

QueenMod:SecretService.NAME: Secret Service
QueenMod:SecretService.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one of each type of queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile. Combine them into a W.A.S.P. and add it to your hand. Exhaust.

QueenMod:CallToArms.NAME: Call to Arms
QueenMod:CallToArms.DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones from your draw pile. Exhaust.
QueenMod:CallToArms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with queenmod:Drones from your draw pile.

QueenMod:TeaTime.NAME: Tea Time
QueenMod:TeaTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Nectar. Costs 1 more for each Attack in your hand.

QueenMod:PlanOfAction.NAME: Plan of Action
QueenMod:PlanOfAction.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Choose to gain Strength, Dexterity, Industry or a mixture of all three. Exhaust.
